headline: Ask HN: How do you repair your personal C? Advice on thermal paste?
description:
There are issues with my only work-suitable notebook, like the crackling sound from the cooler fan upon boot-up, occasional overheats on moderate-to-high RAM/CPU loads (at [1] more detailed description). This HP laptop has just 3 years of moderate usage. Can you advise on should I replace the CPU thermal paste?

[1] https://www.ifixit.com/Answers/View/723317/Optimal+repair+of+HP+250+G6:+overheat,+cooler,+display+frame#answer723320
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 你如何修复你的个人C？关于散热膏的建议？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 你如何修復你的個人C？關於散熱膏的建議？
description_zh-Hans:
我唯一适合工作的笔记本有一些问题，比如开机时冷却器风扇发出噼里啪啦的声音，在中度到高度的内存/CPU负载下偶尔会过热（在[1]更详细的描述）。这台惠普笔记本电脑只有3年的适度使用时间。你能建议我是否应该更换CPU散热膏？

[1] https://www.ifixit.com/Answers/View/723317/Optimal+repair+of+HP+250+G6:+overheat,+cooler,+display+frame#answer723320
description_zh-Hant:
我唯一適合工作的筆記本有一些問題，比如開機時冷卻器風扇發出噼裡啪啦的聲音，在中度到高度的內存/CPU負載下偶爾會過熱（在[1]更詳細的描述）。這臺惠普筆記本電腦只有3年的適度使用時間。你能建議我是否應該更換CPU散熱膏？

[1] https://www.ifixit.com/Answers/View/723317/Optimal+repair+of+HP+250+G6:+overheat,+cooler,+display+frame#answer723320
